      About

      4,5
      Excellent
      30 315 reviews
      #9 of 31 hotels in Dominican Republic
      Location
      Cleanliness
      Service
      Value
      The 1,775 room Hard Rock Hotel & Casino Punta Cana is situated on pristine sugar white sands stretching 121-acres along Macao Beach in the Dominican Republic. Hard Rock's first all-inclusive hotel and casino exudes lavish five-star amenities and personal service to create the ultimate rock star getaway. Among the resort's many offerings are luxe accommodations, the signature Rock Spa(R), 18-hole Nicklaus designed golf course, iconic music memorabilia and a larger-than-life Vegas-style casino - the largest in the Dominican Republic, featuring Oro nightclub. Guests also enjoy 11 expansive pools, four swim-up bars, a kids pool and lazy river. A variety of gourmet dining options is available through the resort's nine restaurants. The property also features more than 65,000 square-feet of flexible event and meeting space.

      Ryan D asked a question 11 Jun
      I am sapposed to be going my honey moon here in 5 weeks with my wife to be . After hearing all these stories about deaths etc I think it’s best to try cancel . Can anyone advise me that’s stayed recently ? Thanks Ryan Scotland
      Answer from Tom R
      11 Jun |
      Ryan do not go if you can't relax at the resort or in the DR. We have been many times over the years and just got back in Feb 2019 and going back in November. I can't explain the deaths but death happens everywhere. I feel safer at Hard Rock than I do in some American cities. Maybe there is a nut out there doing something, but as a retired firefighter I have seen so much in this country it really doesn't bother me. Don't drink from mini bar if worried, we are members so we order our bottle's for our room. We have private pools to use and its quiet most of the time. I would tell you that we don't go into town at all, not much there. Excursions are ok if you like that type of thing but just lay by the beach or pool and enjoy your honeymoon. please contact me if you have any questions but I want you to know we would not be members of these resorts that we take our family to if we didn't think it was safe. Hard Rock also has security and lifeguards on the beach. Please let me know if I can help you to ease your mind on any other details, want you to have a great trip!
      1 vote
